panels.description: This method is only called when no value was found in cache

targets.expr: sum(irate(PrintersClient_getPrinters_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[1m])) / sum(irate(PrintersClient_getPrinters_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[1m]))

panels.title: get-printers (direct) duration [1m]

panels.description: This method is only called when no value was found in cache

targets.expr: sum by (hostPrefix) (irate(PrintersClient_getPrinters_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[1m])) / sum by (hostPrefix) (irate(PrintersClient_getPrinters_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[1m]))

panels.title: get-printers (direct) average duration by store [1m]

panels.description: This method is only called when no value was found in cache

targets.expr: topk(10, (sum by (hostPrefix) (increase(PrintersClient_getPrinters_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[$__range])) / sum by (hostPrefix) (increase(PrintersClient_getPrinters_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[$__range]))))

panels.title: get-printers (direct) top 10 slowest stores [selected range]

panels.description: Had to use flat lines, because prometheus 'increase' function can't calculate increase from zero (nothing).

targets.expr: sum by (hostPrefix, exception) (PrintersClient_getPrinters_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception!="none"})

panels.title: get-printers (direct) errors by (store, exception)
get-printers (cached, retried) count by store [selected range]

panels.description: When all retries did not help

targets.expr: sum by (hostPrefix, exception) (PrintersIntegrationService_getPrinters_total{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception!="none"})

panels.title: get-printers (cached, retried) errors by (store, exception)

targets.expr: sum(irate(PrintersClient_printFile_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[1m])) / sum(irate(PrintersClient_printFile_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[1m]))

sum by (hostPrefix) (irate(PrintersClient_printFile_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[1m])) / sum by (hostPrefix) (irate(PrintersClient_printFile_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[1m]))

topk(10, (sum by (hostPrefix) (increase(PrintersClient_printFile_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[$__range])) / sum by (hostPrefix) (increase(PrintersClient_printFile_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[$__range]))))

sum(irate(ActionsService_fillAndBuildDocument_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[1m])) / sum(irate(ActionsService_fillAndBuildDocument_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[1m]))

sum by (fileType, templateName) (irate(ActionsService_fillAndBuildDocument_seconds_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[1m])) / sum by (fileType, templateName) (irate(ActionsService_fillAndBuildDocument_seconds_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service", exception="none"}[1m]))

sum by (fileType, templateName) (irate(Custom_ActionsService_DocumentContentArraySize_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}[1m])) / sum by (fileType, templateName) (irate(Custom_ActionsService_DocumentContentArraySize_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}[1m]))

sum by (fileType) (irate(Custom_ActionsService_BuildResultDocumentSizeKBytes_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}[1m])) / sum by (fileType) (irate(Custom_ActionsService_BuildResultDocumentSizeKBytes_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}[1m]))

panels.title: build-document file size KBytes by fileType [1m]

targets.expr: sum by (fileType, templateName) (irate(Custom_ActionsService_BuildResultDocumentSizeKBytes_sum{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}[1m])) / sum by (fileType, templateName) (irate(Custom_ActionsService_BuildResultDocumentSizeKBytes_count{pod=~"$pod", namespace="$namespace", service="$service"}[1m]))

panels.title: build-document file size KBytes by (fileType, templateName) [1m]
